SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AccessException
Custom exception class for handling access-related errors.
Account
Represents an account with associated expenses.
AccountPage
Manages the account page for the application.
Actions
Interface to manage account actions.
AddExpense
The AddExpense class handles the UI and logic for adding a new expense in the application.
Categories
Enum representing all the categories.
CategoryFilter
Utility class for filtering expenses by category.
Color
Class representing a color.
DBManager
Implements the Actions interface for database operations.
ExpenseAmountComparator
Comparator for comparing expenses by amount.
ExpenseController
MVC class for managing an expense.
ExpenseDateComparator
Comparator for comparing expenses by date.
ExpenseModel
MVC class representing an expense model.
ExpenseNameComparator
A comparator for comparing two ExpenseController objects by their expense names.
ExpensesPage
Represents the page for displaying and managing expenses.
ExpenseView
MVC class for the expense view.
FilterObj
Class for managing and displaying a dropdown list used for filtering expenses by category.
FormController
MVC Controller class for managing the form page.
FormModel
Model class for managing user authentication and registration.
graphicPage
Represents the graphical interface for displaying expense data over a selected range of months.
LocalDate
This class represents a local date with day, month, year, and leap year information.
Main
Main application class for tracking expenses.
Model
MVC Model class for managing the application state and interactions.
OrderObj
Class for managing and displaying a dropdown list used for ordering expenses.
UsernameException
Exception thrown when a username-related error occurs.
